Name: Counter Terrorist Strike Force
Description:
Select your favorite weapon and play the most advance and challenging shooting game of 2018. Each level will  challenge your gaming experience, can you rescue hostage and eliminate hiding terrorist on different spots.

Join elite force and engage into battle to save innocent and take down extremest in this action packed 3D shooter game. Multiple weapons and engaging game play, defuse bomb and save the day. It need tactical strategy to take down armed enemies hidden on various blind spots. Enjoy counter terrorist strike force newest shooting game to take down enemies and save innocent civilians. Play this game on your apple phone and tablets.

Share us your feedback with reviews so we can design more challenging and action packed games to entertain you.

Name: Huahai Life-Potted Platform
Description:
Huahai Life Co.Ltd. was founded in 2018, is located in Hangzhou, China, the main products are potted, ornamental trees and so on. Since its inception, the company to advanced production equipment, perfect after-sales service, rich production experience and high-quality product quality has been trusted by customers.

The company has a variety of potted sales have in the eyes of the majority of customers to form a brand effect, quality clearance, so that customers rest assured. Looking to the future, the company will be more quality products and better service, and strive to become a flower industry in the outstanding enterprises and continue to work hard.
